item.title: Umm 2 things how do i make a pictu bigger and also my cs3 doesnt have magic wand
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Donâ€™t use rubbish little pictures like that.

Anyway, on your layer 1, just press Control+T and drag out while holding shift. Photoshop should automatically unpixelise it.

item.title: Umm 2 things how do i make a pictu bigger and also my cs3 doesnt have magic wand
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Okay first maximize it and zoom to 100%. Then right click on the tool below the move one and see if the wand tool is there. If not try pressing W.

item.title: Umm 2 things how do i make a pictu bigger and also my cs3 doesnt have magic wand
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Post a screen shot of your cs3 tools please.

And when you open cs3, it asks you what dimensions you would like for your canvas, sig size = 400x100 usually, although it can go a bit bigger or smaller.

Read full topic
